title: kAruNya tiru maindA (sj)
sahitya:
kAruNya tiru manidA karuNai purindE karam sumandE kA Ishanum nI


1:  tarAtalam pugazh vAri enadarum aruL uruvAm AbirahAm dEvanum nI
 caraNam 2    cintai magizhvum endan bandham tulaiyavum undan maindan enrum magizhndandu mundu karamum sumandu
 caraNam 3    unai mana malaroDu dinam paNIndaDi tozhumpozhudalaindiDap-pala iDar taru bhuvi tanil
 caraNam 4    sarva guNa rahitam nI sattiyan nI nittiyan nImaddhiyan nI muttiyum nI mutti taru karttanum nI
 caraNam 5    pAzhum ulagin mA tuyaramO koDidu aDar perum vanamidil agappaDAmal
